ee sahodarayan thundenama aabram samanga giwisumak athi karagena sitiyoya. 14 thama gnyathi puthrayawa paharagena giya bawa+ aabramta danaganna labunu wita, ohugema niwase upan,+ satanata daksha wu dasayan thunsiya dahaatadenekuwa thoragena+ ohu dan dakwa+ ema kollakaruwanwa luhubanda giyeya. 15 rathriyedi ohu thama dasa senawa kandayam kihipayakata beda+ owun samanga damaskayata uthuren pihiti hoba dakwama kollakarunwa luhubanda gos parajaya kaleya. 16 lothge badu bahiradiya athuluwa kolla kanu labu hama deyakma aabram aapasu gaththeya.+ ohuge gnyathi puthraya wu lothwada sthrin athulu mulu senangawada ohu beragaththeya.+ 17 aabram kedorlayomer rajuwada ohu samanga siti anik rajawarunwada parajaya kara nawatha ohuge kudaram wethata gaman karamin sitiyeya.
ehi athulatha ape saura graha mandalayehi siyalu grahalokawala kaksha atha.

goda sakasima thun wani thattuwata pasu ihatha paridi shaka kotas ha sathwa apadrawya nawatha thattu lesa thanpath karanna.thattu 2 – 3 kata warak ”muhun” isima sidu karanna.thattu 3 – 4 kata warak rok pospet isimada sidu karanna.me aakarayata amudrawya bhawitha kara adi 5 – 5 pamana us wana se goda sakas kara ganna.goda sakasimedi dirimata pahasu ha apahasu amudrawya maruwen maruwata gode thanpath karanna.shaka amudrawya thattu 2-3 kata warak sathwa apadrawya thattuwak yodanna.dina 7-8 kin gode usa aduwi athi bawa pene.dirapath kirima ikman kirima dirapath wimata apahasu amudrawya (wiyali kola, piduru, li kudu wani da) thattuwak lesa thanpath kala pasu eeta udin saththwa pohora thattuwak ho ”muhun” yedima dirapath wima ikman karanu atha.dirapath wimata apahasu amudrawya ha dirapath wimata pahasu amudrawya gode maruwen maruwata thanpath kirima wadath yogya we.shaka kotas thattu 2 – 3 kata warak ho saththwa pohora thattuwak bhawitha karanna.sathwa pohora sapaya ganimata apahasu nam sathwa pohora thuni thattuwak lesa pamanak yodanna.sathwa pohora warga gananawak thibe nam eewa shaka kotas thattu 2 – 3 kata warak wiwidha warga lesa wena wena thattu lesa thanpath karanna.
nano anshuwa samanga pitatha prushtaya sahitha nano balbaya siyalu wargawala wishabija winasha kirima sandaha nana kamarawala ho muluthangeyi ho sawi kala hakiya.
